16// ecma402/#sec-getoptionsobject and temporal/#sec-getoptionsobject
17V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT MaybeHandle<JSReceiver> GetOptionsObject(
18 Isolate* isolate, Handle<Object> options, const char* method_name);
19

23
24// ECMA402 9.2.10. GetOption( options, property, type, values, fallback)
25// ecma402/#sec-getoption and temporal/#sec-getoption
26//
27// This is specialized for the case when type is string.
28//
29// Instead of passing undefined for the values argument as the spec
30// defines, pass in an empty vector.
31//
32// Returns true if options object has the property and stores the
33// result in value. Returns false if the value is not found. The
34// caller is required to use fallback value appropriately in this
35// case.
36//
37// method_name is a string denoting the method the call from; used when
38// printing the error message.
39V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Maybe<bool> GetStringOption(
40 Isolate* isolate, Handle<JSReceiver> options, const char* property,
41 const std::vector<const char*>& values, const char* method_name,
42 std::unique_ptr<char[]>* result);
43
44// A helper template to get string from option into a enum.
45// The enum in the enum_values is the corresponding value to the strings
46// in the str_values. If the option does not contains name,
47// default_value will be return.
48template <typename T>
49V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT static Maybe<T> GetStringOption(
50 Isolate* isolate, Handle<JSReceiver> options, const char* name,
51 const char* method_name, const std::vector<const char*>& str_values,
52 const std::vector<T>& enum_values, T default_value) {
53 DCHECK_EQ(str_values.size(), enum_values.size());
54 std::unique_ptr<char[]> cstr;
55 Maybe<bool> found =
56 GetStringOption(isolate, options, name, str_values, method_name, &cstr);
57 MAYBE_RETURN(found, Nothing<T>());
58 if (found.FromJust()) {
59 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(cstr.get());
60 for (size_t i = 0; i < str_values.size(); i++) {
61 if (strcmp(cstr.get(), str_values[i]) == 0) {
62 return Just(enum_values[i]);
63 }
64 }
65 UNREACHABLE();
66 }
67 return Just(default_value);
68}
69
70// A helper template to get string from option into a enum.
71// The enum in the enum_values is the corresponding value to the strings
72// in the str_values. If the option does not contains name,
73// default_value will be return.
74template <typename T>
75V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT static Maybe<T> GetStringOrBooleanOption(
76 Isolate* isolate, Handle<JSReceiver> options, const char* property,
77 const char* method, const std::vector<const char*>& str_values,
78 const std::vector<T>& enum_values, T true_value, T false_value,
79 T fallback_value) {
80 DCHECK_EQ(str_values.size(), enum_values.size());
81 Factory* factory = isolate->factory();
82 Handle<String> property_str = factory->NewStringFromAsciiChecked(property);
83
84 // 1. Let value be ? Get(options, property).
85 Handle<Object> value;
86 ASSIGN_RETURN_ON_EXCEPTION_VALUE(
87 isolate, value,
88 Object::GetPropertyOrElement(isolate, options, property_str),
89 Nothing<T>());
90 // 2. If value is undefined, then return fallback.
91 if (IsUndefined(*value, isolate)) {
92 return Just(fallback_value);
93 }
94 // 3. If value is true, then return trueValue.
95 if (IsTrue(*value, isolate)) {
96 return Just(true_value);
97 }
98 // 4. Let valueBoolean be ToBoolean(value).
99 bool valueBoolean = Object::BooleanValue(*value, isolate);
100 // 5. If valueBoolean is false, then return valueBoolean.
101 if (!valueBoolean) {
102 return Just(false_value);
103 }
104
105 Handle<String> value_str;
106 // 6. Let value be ? ToString(value).
107 ASSIGN_RETURN_ON_EXCEPTION_VALUE(
108 isolate, value_str, Object::ToString(isolate, value), Nothing<T>());
109 // 7. If value is *"true"* or *"false"*, return _fallback_.
110 if (String::Equals(isolate, value_str, factory->true_string()) ||
111 String::Equals(isolate, value_str, factory->false_string())) {
112 return Just(fallback_value);
113 }
114 // 8. If values does not contain an element equal to _value_, throw a
115 // *RangeError* exception.
116 // 9. Return value.
117 value_str = String::Flatten(isolate, value_str);
118 {
119 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
120 const String::FlatContent& flat = value_str->GetFlatContent(no_gc);
121 int32_t length = value_str->length();
122 for (size_t i = 0; i < str_values.size(); i++) {
123 if (static_cast<int32_t>(strlen(str_values.at(i))) == length) {
124 if (flat.IsOneByte()) {
125 if (CompareCharsEqual(str_values.at(i),
126 flat.ToOneByteVector().begin(), length)) {
127 return Just(enum_values[i]);
128 }
129 } else {
130 if (CompareCharsEqual(str_values.at(i), flat.ToUC16Vector().begin(),
131 length)) {
132 return Just(enum_values[i]);
133 }
134 }
135 }
136 }
137 } // end of no_gc
138 THROW_NEW_ERROR_RETURN_VALUE(
139 isolate,
140 NewRangeError(MessageTemplate::kValueOutOfRange, value,
141 factory->NewStringFromAsciiChecked(method), property_str),
142 Nothing<T>());
143}

145// ECMA402 9.2.10. GetOption( options, property, type, values, fallback)
146// ecma402/#sec-getoption
147//
148// This is specialized for the case when type is boolean.
149//
150// Returns true if options object has the property and stores the
151// result in value. Returns false if the value is not found. The
152// caller is required to use fallback value appropriately in this
153// case.
154//
155// method_name is a string denoting the method it called from; used when
156// printing the error message.
157V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Maybe<bool> GetBoolOption(
158 Isolate* isolate, Handle<JSReceiver> options, const char* property,
159 const char* method_name, bool* result);
160
161V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Maybe<int> GetNumberOption(
162 Isolate* isolate, Handle<JSReceiver> options, Handle<String> property,
163 int min, int max, int fallback);
164
165// #sec-getoption while type is "number"
166V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Maybe<double> GetNumberOptionAsDouble(
167 Isolate* isolate, Handle<JSReceiver> options, Handle<String> property,
168 double default_value);
169
170// ecma402/#sec-defaultnumberoption
171V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Maybe<int> DefaultNumberOption(
172 Isolate* isolate, Handle<Object> value, int min, int max, int fallback,
173 Handle<String> property);
